::: {.cell hash='importacao_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_bf7e3432ab5de72256c8cf623dbb195c'}

library(agridat)

::: {.cell hash='importacao_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_b75d89af06ad14f1111aa4e7ed76fa18'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ec50estimator)
df1 <- multi_isolate
```
:::



# Planilhas do excel:



::: {.cell hash='importacao_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_6db3fd11a1bb40f68ef024df4642aad3'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(readxl)
# Utilizando a primeira aba da planilha "magnesio"
df2 <- read_excel ("dados-diversos.xlsx")

# Utilizando a segunda aba da planilha "mortalidade"
df3 <- read_excel("dados-diversos.xlsx", 4)

# Utilizando a terceira aba da planilha "micelial"
df4 <- read_excel("dados-diversos.xlsx", "micelial")
```
:::



# Arquivo .csv:


::: {.cell hash='importacao_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_0bba860c3f48e8ab8ec66910bc15d9fe'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
df5 <- read_csv("dados-diversos.csv", "milho")
```
:::




# Dados em planilha online: 


::: {.cell hash='importacao_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_1cc48f32d422fafd401fec3dc040e00d'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(gsheet)
df6 <- gsheet2tbl("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bq2N19DcZdtax2fQW9OHSGMR0X2__Z9T/edit#gid=983033137")
```
:::



# Visualização dos dados 


::: {.cell hash='importacao_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_ce2845fb9ee88e7c595969a3597b9320'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggthemes)
library(ggplot2)

g1 <- df6 %>% 
  ggplot(aes(trat, comp))+
  geom_boxplot(outlier.colour = NA,
               fill = "darkmagenta") + 
  geom_jitter(width = 0.05, color = "black", shape = 2, size = 3)+
  theme_clean()+
  labs(x = "Tratamento",
       y = "Comprimento (mm)", 
       title = "Meu primeiro ggplot", 
       caption = "fonte: Dados diversos") +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0,20), n.breaks = 10)

g1
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](importacao_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Para salvar o ggplot na pasta em PNG, PDF, JPEG e outros.
ggsave("plot1.png", bg= "white")
```
:::
